resources.string: The smarter a person is, the easier it is for him to recognize himself as a fool.
The one who does nothing is never wrong
Least of all are people who want to appear simple
We are here to contribute to this world. Why else are we here?
If a person has not found something to die for, he is not able to live.
Music turns on the heart so that the body dances and sings. And there is music with which you want to share everything that hurts
If someone has harmed you, do not take revenge. Sit on the bank of the river and soon you will see the corpse of your enemy floating past you.
If its hard for you, then youre going uphill. If its easy for you, then youre flying into the abyss
